DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: Before I can enter the bathroom, someone shoves me from behind.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Kris?! What was that for?

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: She frantically rummages through my bag, finally stopping to pull out my binder.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Hey! That's my stuff!

DialogueNode.Name: Kris
DialogueNode.Text: I'll be taking this.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: She pulls out my English homework, which is due in about five minutes.

DialogueNode.Name: Kris
DialogueNode.Text: Keep quiet and you won't get in trouble.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: It's not hard for me to imagine Kris pulling a couple strings to get me in trouble.

DialogueOption.Text: "Sounds like someone didn't do their homework in time."

DialogueNode.Name: Kris
DialogueNode.Text: I said quiet! One more snarky comment and consider your time at this school over.

DialogueNode.Name: Kris
DialogueNode.Text: You wouldn't understand, so just do your part and stay out of it.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: Kris deftly slides out of the way, simultaneously sweeping my legs out from under me. In the moment, I can't help but appreciate her fast reactions.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: She tosses my bag on the ground, taking off with my English homework.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I notice a notification on my prism.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: Hey, did you just get mugged by Kris?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: You too?

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: Yeah...

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: What should we do?

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: My ideas are just about as good as yours.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: How about we both try and prove our innocence in different ways?

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: Well, maybe we can help each other. If I find something on my side, maybe you can use it to help you out?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: I see what you mean...

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: How's this: one of us tells the principal what happens, and one of us tries to confront Kris in front of other students?

DialogueOption.Text: "One of those sounds a lot more appealing than the other..."

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: You might be right. Well, why don't you go ahead and pick what you're going to do?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: I'm going to...

DialogueOption.Text: report the incident to the school.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: Perfect, I was thinking of reporting the incident. We'll both follow through and see how it turns out for each of us.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Sounds good.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I run towards the exit that Kris left from.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: After running through the hallways, I track down Kris, who is outside of our first class with the "popular people."

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Kris! Give my homework back!

DialogueNode.Name: Kris
DialogueNode.Text: Huh? What do you mean?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: You know what I mean. You stole my homework just now. Give it back.

DialogueNode.Name: Bystander 1
DialogueNode.Text: Are you in your right mind? Why would Kris even want to steal your homework? She has the best grades at this school!

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: She-

DialogueNode.Name: Kris
DialogueNode.Text: Look, I know I lent you my homework because you asked for help, but you can't just demand that it's yours.

DialogueNode.Name: Kris
DialogueNode.Text: I can't believe you were just going to turn in my homework and claim it as your own.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: I-

DialogueNode.Name: Teacher
DialogueNode.Text: What's going on here?

DialogueNode.Name: Kris
DialogueNode.Text: [main] here took my homework and tried to pass it off as their own.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: Everyone around Kris nods in agreement.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: B-but-

DialogueNode.Name: Teacher
DialogueNode.Text: [main], please come with me to the disciplinary office.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I follow the teacher as Kris makes a face at me.

DialogueNode.Name: Teacher
DialogueNode.Text: Would you like to explain yourself?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Look. What Kris said isn't true. I-

DialogueNode.Name: Teacher
DialogueNode.Text: Everyone around you said that you were guilty. And Kris would never lie.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: B-but-

DialogueNode.Name: Teacher
DialogueNode.Text: On top of trying to take Kris's homework, you also gathered a large crowd and created a disturbance.

DialogueNode.Name: Teacher
DialogueNode.Text: I'm afraid I'll have to give you a detention.

DialogueNode.Name: Teacher
DialogueNode.Text: And also, you don't have your homework?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: I do-

DialogueNode.Name: Teacher
DialogueNode.Text: I'm afraid I'll have to give you a zero on the assignment as well.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: Overwhelmed with shame, I walk with my teacher to first period, finish the school day, and find my friends.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: Perfect, I was thinking of chasing Kris. We'll both follow through and see how it turns out for each of us.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Sounds good.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I head to the disciplinary office to report the incident.

DialogueNode.Name: Teacher
DialogueNode.Text: What brings you here?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Kris mugged me and stole my homework.

DialogueNode.Name: Teacher
DialogueNode.Text: Kris? Kris would never steal homework...

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: B-but-

DialogueNode.Name: Teacher
DialogueNode.Text: Look, is this just an excuse? Did you do your homework?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: I did, but Kris stole it.

DialogueNode.Name: Teacher
DialogueNode.Text: Kris stole it, huh?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Yeah...

DialogueNode.Name: Teacher
DialogueNode.Text: I'm afraid I'll have to give you a zero on the homework for the time being. We'll look into the incident.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I get the feeling that the teacher's promise will never come to fruition. I walk with my teacher to my first period and finish the school day.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I find my significant other, Sawyer, hanging out with their friends.

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: Hi, [main]! I didn't see you at lunch today. Are you doing okay?

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: Fine as in, "I walked around looking depressed all day"?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Fine. Kris beat me up this morning.

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: Oh. That's... I'm sorry to hear that.

DialogueNode.Name: Friend 1
DialogueNode.Text: This sounds like a conversation that we shouldn't be a part of. Catch you later, Sawyer!

DialogueNode.Name: Friend 2
DialogueNode.Text: Bye Sawyer!

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: Wait, Kris did that?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Yeah.

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: What happened after?

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I explain what happened.

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: Psssh. I should have expected something was up with Kris.

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: I mean, how is it possible to take advanced level classes with every extracurricular activity the school offers and expect to finish the homework?

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: Oh, I believed you mentioned something about activating a prism? Don't you usually not use them?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Lyanna gave it to me.

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: You'll do anything she asks, won't you?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Is someone jealous?

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: Never mind. I wanted to ask you what your paraself did.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Oh shoot, I forgot.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Oh shoot, I forgot.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Hey para-[main], how did going to the office go?

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: It went exactly as planned.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Really?

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: Yeah, as it turns out, we’re not Kris’s first victim. Another victim spoke up and helped me convince the principal. I’m kind of a school hero now.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Hey para-[main], how did confronting Kris go?

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: It went perfectly.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: Yeah, as it turns out, we’re not Kris’s first victim. Another victim spoke up when I was confronting Kris, and the crowd actually turned on her.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: That's great...

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: How about you?

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: That doesn’t sound good. At least you can use some of the information I found. Why don’t you go and get Jim Beaux to help you?

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: He was the other victim that spoke up. I’m sure he’d love to help you out.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: That sounds like it could work. Who is Jim Beaux and where can I find them?

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: They’re in our English class, remember? He’s the kid who wears that weird Marble shirt everyday and barely participates.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: That’s him? I suppose that makes sense.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: Why don’t you try and find him right now? I’m pretty sure he’s in the math club.

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: That sounds like a plan. Why don’t we head to the math club right now, honey?

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I head towards the math wing in search of the math club.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Hey Sawyer, will this really work out? If I couldn’t do it before…

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: If your paraself could do it, I don’t see why not.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I easily find Jim solving math problems in the corner of the room.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Hey Jim, do you think you could help me out?

DialogueNode.Name: Jim
DialogueNode.Text: Were you that kid who accused Kris of taking your homework out before class today?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Yeah, that was me.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Could you help me convince the principal that Kris took it?

DialogueNode.Name: Jim
DialogueNode.Text: Are you that kid who didn’t have their homework in English class?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Yeah, Kris took it.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: I was actually wondering if you could help me convince the principal that Kris took it.

DialogueNode.Name: Jim
DialogueNode.Text: Why me?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: My paraself told me that I’m not the only one Kris has targeted.

DialogueNode.Name: Jim
DialogueNode.Text: Well, your paraself isn’t wrong. Kris has taken my work multiple times.

DialogueNode.Name: Jim
DialogueNode.Text: Believe me, I’ve already tried reporting it to the school. What makes you think that this time will be different?

DialogueNode.Name: Jim
DialogueNode.Text: It’s two nobodies against the school president.

DialogueNode.Name: Jim
DialogueNode.Text: I’m done trying. My family is moving away after this year anyways.

DialogueNode.Name: Jim
DialogueNode.Text: Is that all?

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: It worked for [main]’s paraself.

DialogueNode.Name: Jim
DialogueNode.Text: Working for a paraself doesn’t mean ANYTHING.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: Jim seems fired up about this topic.

DialogueNode.Name: Jim
DialogueNode.Text: I don’t want to hear about what worked and what didn’t for your paraself. Just leave me alone.

DialogueNode.Name: Jim
DialogueNode.Text: Your paraself, huh?

DialogueNode.Name: Jim
DialogueNode.Text: Working for your paraself doesn’t mean anything. You know that, right?

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: What do you mean by that? It’s a very similar situation.

DialogueNode.Name: Jim
DialogueNode.Text: Take my advice on this: never compare yourself to parallel worlds. You can find any fate if you look hard enough. Now are we done here?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: It was worth a shot.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: Sawyer and I head out of the math wing. I bring out my prism and message my paraself on the way.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Jim won’t help me.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: He’s not exactly an easy person to work with, I’ll admit.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: So no luck with the principal's office?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: I didn’t even bother going.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: Well, that’s tough. I’ll let you know if I find anything else that could help you out.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Thanks, I guess.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 1
DialogueNode.Text: I wish I could do more for you.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Don’t worry about it. I’ll figure it out.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I put my prism away.

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: That trip went poorly.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: It went about as well as the rest of my day.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: It’s even worse knowing that I could have been on my paraself’s side. Am I just unlucky?

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: Paraselves are... Do you think we matter?

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: Even though there’s probably over a billion versions of me?

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: I’ve been thinking the same thing recently.

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: Not a very good one.

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: Never mind.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I get a text from my mom saying she’s waiting for me in the car.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Ok, Sawyer, I’m going home. You need a ride?

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: I’m good for today. Thanks for offering though.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Ok then, bye!

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: If you're reading this, I have made a huge mistake.

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: Later, nerd.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I head home, falling asleep during the car ride. Homework is boring, as always, and I find myself playing video games until dinner time.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: I made omurice for dinner tonight.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: It's good.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I head downstairs to eat.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: So what happened at school today?

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I start to tell her what happened today. She interrupts to scold me for using prisms.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: Didn’t I tell you not to get involved with the prism business? Those things drive people insane.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Says the one who works at a prism company.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: Hey, I’m doing my part to pay the bills. Oh well, just don’t get too wrapped up in your paraself’s life.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I finish telling her my story without any further interruptions.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: That’s frustrating. I’ll have a talk with the principal tomorrow.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Wait, I have an idea. If you let me create another paraself, we can scout the conversation in one world so that at least one timeline gets the result we want.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: As long as you promise to not use that prism after tomorrow.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Thanks mom.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: I have a bunch of prisms from work. Here, let me get one for you.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: My mom heads up to her room and comes back down with an unactivated prism.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: I hope that this works.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: We should wait until a little closer to the principal before we activate it.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: I would, but I have to base my schedule around this. I don’t think it’ll change much if we just do it now.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Ok then. Blue light side gets to make the final decision.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I activate the prism. Again, a blue light flashes out from the prism.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Okay. You know the plan, right?

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: It’s your call, since I’m red.

DialogueOption.Text: Trick my paraself into going first.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: Sounds like a plan. I guess we’ll check in tomorrow.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: Thanks for doing the tough job, by the way.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: No problem. I’ll go tomorrow after school.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: I suppose I’ll go right after you then.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: Fair is fair.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: I’ll go tomorrow morning then.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Perfect, I'll go after school.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: I’ll go first. Can you go after school if I go in the morning?

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: If I tell my paraself that I went and succeeded, they should go without hesitation.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: I don’t have an issue with that.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: After my paraself goes, I can see what happened in their world and plan around it.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Perfect, I’ll go tomorrow before school then.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: In any case, we should get ready for tomorrow. Talk to you later.

DialogueNode.Name: Paraself 2
DialogueNode.Text: Ok, sounds good. Talk to you later.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: What time should I be there?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: After school. Just be there at the normal pick up time.

DialogueNode.Name: Mom
DialogueNode.Text: Okay. Love you sweetie.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Love you too mom.

DialogueNode.Name: none
DialogueNode.Text: I head to my room, get ready for tomorrow, and head to sleep.

DialogueNode.Name: Sawyer
DialogueNode.Text: Middle aged enough to not use prisms regularly.

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Hey Jim, do you think you could help me out?

DialogueNode.Name: You
DialogueNode.Text: Oh shoot, I forgot.
